request: Create a basic circle animation
script:
from manim import *

class BasicCircle(Scene):
    def construct(self):
        # Create a circle
        circle = Circle(radius=2)
        circle.set_color(BLUE)
        
        # Animate the circle
        self.play(Create(circle))
        self.wait(1)

request: Create a text example animation
script:
from manim import *

class TextExample(Scene):
    def construct(self):
        # Create text
        text = Text("Hello, Manim!")
        text.set_color(RED)
        
        # Animate text
        self.play(Write(text))
        self.wait(2)

request: Create a math formula animation
script:
from manim import *

class MathFormula(Scene):
    def construct(self):
        # Create mathematical formula
        formula = MathTex("E = mc^2")
        formula.set_color(GREEN)
        
        # Display formula
        self.play(Write(formula))
        self.wait(2)

request: Create a shape transformation animation
script:
from manim import *

class ShapeTransformation(Scene):
    def construct(self):
        # Create a circle
        circle = Circle(radius=1)
        circle.set_color(BLUE)
        
        # Create a square
        square = Square(side_length=2)
        square.set_color(RED)
        
        # Show circle first
        self.play(Create(circle))
        self.wait(1)
        
        # Transform circle to square
        self.play(Transform(circle, square))
        self.wait(1)

request: Make a line transform into a arrow
script:
from manim import *
import numpy as np

class LineScene(Scene):
    def construct(self):
                # Create first line
        line_obj = Line(start=LEFT, end=RIGHT)
        line_obj.set_color(BLUE)
        
        # Create second dot
        dot_obj = Dot(point=ORIGIN)
        dot_obj.set_color(ORANGE)
        
        # Show first shape
        self.play(Create(line_obj))
        self.wait(1)
        
        # Transform to second shape
        self.play(Transform(line_obj, dot_obj))
        self.wait(1)

class TextScene(Scene):
    def construct(self):
                # Create text
        text_obj = Text("Technology")
        text_obj.set_color(BLUE)
        
        # Animate text
        self.play(Write(text_obj))
        self.wait(1)

request: Make a dot transform into a dot
script:
from manim import *
import numpy as np

class DotScene(Scene):
    def construct(self):
                # Create first dot
        dot_obj = Dot(point=ORIGIN)
        dot_obj.set_color(BLUE)
        
        # Create second mathtext
        mathtext_obj = MathTex("x^2 + y^2 = r^2")
        mathtext_obj.set_color(DARK_GRAY)
        
        # Show first shape
        self.play(Create(dot_obj))
        self.wait(1)
        
        # Transform to second shape
        self.play(Transform(dot_obj, mathtext_obj))
        self.wait(1)

class SquareScene(Scene):
    def construct(self):
                # Create a square
        square_obj = Square(side_length=2)
        square_obj.set_color(BLUE)
        
        # Animate square
        self.play(Create(square_obj))
        self.wait(1)

request: Animate a dot using fadeout
script:
from manim import *
import numpy as np

class DotScene(Scene):
    def construct(self):
                # Create a dot
        dot_obj = Dot(point=ORIGIN)
        dot_obj.set_color(BLUE)
        
        # Animate dot
        self.play(FadeOut(dot_obj))
        self.wait(1)

request: Draw a PINK arrow and make it transform
script:
from manim import *
import numpy as np

class ArrowScene(Scene):
    def construct(self):
                # Create first arrow
        arrow_obj = Arrow(start=LEFT, end=RIGHT)
        arrow_obj.set_color(PINK)
        
        # Create second mathtext
        mathtext_obj = MathTex("x^2 + y^2 = r^2")
        mathtext_obj.set_color(BLACK)
        
        # Show first shape
        self.play(Create(arrow_obj))
        self.wait(1)
        
        # Transform to second shape
        self.play(Transform(arrow_obj, mathtext_obj))
        self.wait(1)

from manim import *
import numpy as np

class TextScene(Scene):
    def construct(self):
                # Create text
        text_obj = Text("Technology")
        text_obj.set_color(BLUE)
        
        # Animate text
        self.play(Write(text_obj))
        self.wait(1)

import numpy as np

class MathtextScene(Scene):
    def construct(self):
                # Create mathematical formula

        # Display formula

        self.wait(2)

request: Make a dot that transform
script:
from manim import *
import numpy as np

class DotScene(Scene):
    def construct(self):
                # Create first dot
        dot_obj = Dot(point=ORIGIN)
        dot_obj.set_color(BLUE)
        
        # Create second line
        line_obj = Line(start=LEFT, end=RIGHT)
        line_obj.set_color(LIGHT_GRAY)
        
        # Show first shape
        self.play(Create(dot_obj))
        self.wait(1)
        
        # Transform to second shape
        self.play(Transform(dot_obj, line_obj))
        self.wait(1)

        # Create second line

        line_obj.set_color(WHITE)
        
        # Show first shape
        self.play(Create(circle_obj))
        self.wait(1)
        
        # Transform to second shape
        self.play(Transform(circle_obj, line_obj))
        self.wait(1)

from manim import *
import numpy as np

class LineScene(Scene):
    def construct(self):
                # Create a line
        line_obj = Line(start=LEFT, end=RIGHT)
        line_obj.set_color(BLUE)
        
        # Animate line
        self.play(Scale(line_obj, factor=2))
        self.wait(1)

request: Make a dot transform into a arrow
script:
from manim import *
import numpy as np

class ArrowScene(Scene):
    def construct(self):
                # Create first arrow
        arrow_obj = Arrow(start=LEFT, end=RIGHT)
        arrow_obj.set_color(BLUE)
        
        # Create second line
        line_obj = Line(start=LEFT, end=RIGHT)
        line_obj.set_color(PURPLE)
        
        # Show first shape
        self.play(Create(arrow_obj))
        self.wait(1)
        
        # Transform to second shape
        self.play(Transform(arrow_obj, line_obj))
        self.wait(1)

        self.wait(1)

from manim import *
import numpy as np

class RectangleScene(Scene):
    def construct(self):
                # Create first rectangle
        rectangle_obj = Rectangle(width=3, height=2)
        rectangle_obj.set_color(BLUE)
        
        # Create second text
        text_obj = Text("Hello World")
        text_obj.set_color(ORANGE)
        
        # Show first shape
        self.play(Create(rectangle_obj))
        self.wait(1)
        
        # Transform to second shape
        self.play(Transform(rectangle_obj, text_obj))
        self.wait(1)

        self.play(Create(rectangle_obj))
        self.wait(1)
        
        # Transform to second shape
        self.play(Transform(rectangle_obj, line_obj))
        self.wait(1)

import numpy as np

class TextScene(Scene):
    def construct(self):
                # Create text
        text_obj = Text("Technology")
        text_obj.set_color(BLUE)
        
        # Animate text
        self.play(Write(text_obj))
        self.wait(1)

request: Make a dot transform into a circle
script:
from manim import *
import numpy as np

class CircleScene(Scene):
    def construct(self):
                # Create first circle
        circle_obj = Circle(radius=1)
        circle_obj.set_color(BLUE)
        
        # Create second square
        square_obj = Square(side_length=2)
        square_obj.set_color(LIGHT_GRAY)
        
        # Show first shape
        self.play(Create(circle_obj))
        self.wait(1)
        
        # Transform to second shape
        self.play(Transform(circle_obj, square_obj))
        self.wait(1)

from manim import *
import numpy as np

class LineScene(Scene):
    def construct(self):
                # Create a line
        line_obj = Line(start=LEFT, end=RIGHT)
        line_obj.set_color(GREEN)
        
        # Animate line
        self.play(line_obj.animate.shift(RIGHT))
        self.wait(1)

request: Animate a rectangle using transform
script:
from manim import *
import numpy as np

class RectangleScene(Scene):
    def construct(self):
                # Create first rectangle
        rectangle_obj = Rectangle(width=3, height=2)
        rectangle_obj.set_color(BLUE)
        
        # Create second square
        square_obj = Square(side_length=2)
        square_obj.set_color(LIGHT_GRAY)
        
        # Show first shape
        self.play(Create(rectangle_obj))
        self.wait(1)
        
        # Transform to second shape
        self.play(Transform(rectangle_obj, square_obj))
        self.wait(1)

request: Make a square transform into a rectangle
script:
from manim import *
import numpy as np

class SquareScene(Scene):
    def construct(self):
                # Create first square
        square_obj = Square(side_length=2)
        square_obj.set_color(BLUE)
        
        # Create second circle
        circle_obj = Circle(radius=1)
        circle_obj.set_color(YELLOW)
        
        # Show first shape
        self.play(Create(square_obj))
        self.wait(1)
        
        # Transform to second shape
        self.play(Transform(square_obj, circle_obj))
        self.wait(1)

request: Make a rectangle transform into a rectangle
script:
from manim import *
import numpy as np

class RectangleScene(Scene):
    def construct(self):
                # Create first rectangle
        rectangle_obj = Rectangle(width=3, height=2)
        rectangle_obj.set_color(BLUE)
        
        # Create second circle
        circle_obj = Circle(radius=1)
        circle_obj.set_color(DARK_GRAY)
        
        # Show first shape
        self.play(Create(rectangle_obj))
        self.wait(1)
        
        # Transform to second shape
        self.play(Transform(rectangle_obj, circle_obj))
        self.wait(1)
